content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining and transportation system at position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of a BurnerMiningDrill at position (43.0, -82.0), a Furnace at position (41.0, -82.0), and multiple Chests at positions (42.5, -83.5), (44.5, -81.5), and (43.5, -79.5). The BurnerMiningDrill is connected to the Chest at position (42.5, -83.5) via a drop position. The Furnace is not currently being used. The BurnerInserter at position (43.5, -80.5) is used to transport coal from the Chest at position (43.5, -81.5) to the Chest at position (43.5, -79.5).

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items.
- Make sure to check the chest's inventory before extracting items to avoid errors.
### Errors when using a BurnerMiningDrill
- Ensure the BurnerMiningDrill has fuel before attempting to mine.
- Make sure the chest at the drop position is not full to avoid errors.
### Errors when using a BurnerInserter
- Ensure the inserter has space in the destination chest before attempting to insert items.
- Make sure the source chest has items to insert to avoid errors.
